It should also subtly reinforce her noble status without being overly aggressive - more like a cautious but informed diplomatic approach.</think>Ah, signora Chiara — your insights into northern markets are indeed valuable for our Republic’s economic standing. Perhaps I should adjust my approach accordingly?' (this is also in `addSystem.their_reaction_to_activity`).
